heading: Imports & Exports
title: Streamline Your Global Trade Operations with ERP Solutions
description: Navigate the complexities of international trade with our comprehensive ERP solution designed specifically for import/export businesses. Manage documentation, compliance, logistics, and multi-currency transactions all in one platform to expand your global reach while maintaining compliance with international trade regulations.

infoCards.title: Trade Compliance & Documentation
infoCards.description: Automate and manage all import/export documentation including commercial invoices, packing lists, and certificates of origin.

infoCards.title: Logistics & Shipment Management
infoCards.description: Gain end-to-end visibility of your shipments with integrated logistics and freight management.

faqData.question: How does the ERP handle customs documentation for different countries?
faqData.answer: Our ERP includes a comprehensive library of customs forms and documentation requirements for multiple countries, with automatic updates to stay compliant with changing regulations.

faqData.question: Can the system handle multiple currencies and exchange rate fluctuations?
faqData.answer: Yes, the system supports multi-currency transactions with real-time exchange rate updates and automatic revaluation of open items, helping you manage currency risks effectively.

faqData.question: How does the system help with trade compliance?
faqData.answer: The ERP includes built-in compliance checks, restricted party screening, and automated documentation to ensure adherence to international trade regulations and avoid costly penalties.
